rows.name: Support and Maintenance Skills and Knowledge
cells: Elementary support skillset, basic understanding of computer operation and networking concepts.
One year of relevant experience. Good knowledge of computer hardware and operation systems architectures, basic knowledge of networking concepts.
3+ years of relevant experience. Deep knowledge in computer hardware, operating systems and networking domains, solid understanding of enterprise IT infrastructure systems.

5+ years of relevant experience. Deep knowledge in computer hardware, operating systems and networking domains, complete understanding of enterprise IT infrastructure systems.

Good knowledge in some specialized areas (storage systems, server hardware, DC infrastructure systems, LAN cabling practices, etc.).

5+ years of relevant experience. Excellent knowledge in computer hardware, operating systems and networking domains, complete understanding of enterprise IT infrastructure systems.

Excellent knowledge in almost every specialized area (storage systems, server hardware, DC infrastructure systems, LAN cabling practices, etc.).

rows.name: Support/Service Process Knowledge
cells: Not expected to have knowledge or experience of the ITSM (ITIL/ISO 20 000) processes
Expected to be able to follow a defined  ITSM (ITIL/ISO 20 000) processes
Expected to be able to follow and understand a defined ITSM (ITIL/ISO 20 000) process
Expected to be able to follow, understand, and enhance a defined ITSM (ITIL/ISO 20 000) processes
Expected to be able to follow, understand, actively influence and enhance a defined  ITSM (ITIL/ISO 20 000) processes

rows.name: Design and Documentation Skills
cells: Not expected to have  experience of dealing with documentation
Able to read and understand technical and engineering documentation
Able to read and understand technical and engineering documentation
Able to read and understand technical and engineering documentation; able to create technical documentation;
Able to read and understand technical and engineering documentation; able to create high-quality technical documentation, system design documentation, engineering documentation.

rows.name: Job Title
cells: Junior IT Infrastructure Support Engineer
IT Infrastructure Support Engineer
Senior IT Infrastructure Support Engineer
Lead IT Infrastructure Support Engineer
Chief IT Infrastructure Support Engineer

rows.name: Reliability
cells: Expected to work effectively under supervision
Expected to resolve standard support cases and typical incidents effectively without direct supervision
Expected to be self-managing, effectively support IT services delivery in his responsibility area without supervision

Expected to be self-managing, effectively support IT services delivery in his responsibility area without supervision; take technical responsibility for major infrastructure changes implementation, complex incidents and problems resolution

Expected to be self-managing, effectively support IT services delivery in his responsibility area without supervision; take technical responsibility for major infrastructure changes implementation, complex incidents and problems resolution

rows.name: Quality
cells: Expected to possess general sense of responsibility for the quality of his work; minimize reopen rate of his tasks
Expected to possess general sense of responsibility for the quality of his work; minimize reopen rate of his tasks
Expected to deliver high quality service equally considering best practices of infrastructure support and the specifics of the requestor’s needs
Expected to be a role model for his colleagues delivering excellent quality service
Expected to be a role model for his colleagues delivering excellent quality service

rows.name: Communication skills
cells: Not special requirements
Expected to be able to support/drive technical discussions
Expected to be able to participate in phone conferences; be involved in workshops and presentations
Expected to be able to participate in phone conferences; drive the presentations and workshops; work with customer without supervision
Expected to be able to participate in phone conferences; drive the presentations and workshops; work with customer without supervision
